website_summaries.verdict: These shoes have a fashionable take on the classic Converse look and an extra eyelet at the ankle.
pros: Extra padding and support make these comfortable to wear all day
Contrast padding at the ankle for a modern look
cons: Heel pocket may cause blisters for the first few days

customer_reviews.title: Unisex All Star Sneaker:  Perfect fit, excellent shoe!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair of these Converse shoes. The first pair are pretty worn out but I still wear them in the garden and rely on these handsome new boys for casual or daily use. Note the black laces, very nice. You never know if your new sneakers are going to fit the same as your last pair but Converse is very consistent in their sizes and these fit like a glove and oh so comfortable. If you wear a 9 buy a 9, you should be pleased with the fit!
customer_reviews.author: Cary Chauvet

customer_reviews.title: Not leather as described, but still a great shoe
customer_reviews.text: Title says leather, but there is no leather on this shoe. That being said, I do like the shoe and will be keeping them. They seem to be good quality and of course fit great like all Converse. They would get 5 stars if not for the misleading title describing them as leather.
customer_reviews.author: Prime Customer

customer_reviews.title: WTF!!??
customer_reviews.text: I wanted ALL LEATHER, these we're cloth material with around the ankle. VERY DISAPPOINTED. And there's no support whatsoever, feels like I'm walking on the ground.
customer_reviews.author: Ro

customer_reviews.title: Love these sneakers!
customer_reviews.text: I been looking for a new pair to replace the leather chuck taylors my wife bought me 3 years ago. These fit as expected, and are very light. If you need arch support, these shoes are not for you. They could use a bit more padding on the sole, but other than that, they are perfect.
customer_reviews.author: sarajas

customer_reviews.title: converse always fit
customer_reviews.text: Converse All Stars are my go-to shoe. They always fit perfectly and are comfortable right out of the box. I like the new Mid-Rise offerings. Fun, comfortable and generally affordable. Converse has great kicks.
customer_reviews.author: dylan70

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: I love my new Converse. Great fit and comfort. Live the color.
customer_reviews.author: Travlboy1

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Good
customer_reviews.text: I got these in blue and look good. They seem comfortable as well. My only complaint is they run big.
customer_reviews.author: Mjr

customer_reviews.title: Cheap laces!
customer_reviews.text: Shoe laces broke within a week. Are these authentic? Sees like these are fakes.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan P.

customer_reviews.title: Chuck taylor shoe material way too shiny...
customer_reviews.text: I didnt know that the material was not the normal chuck taylor material (usually made from a good canvas material) but instead a shiny material that I dont really like much. Wish they stuck to the original material with this shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander Savala

customer_reviews.title: A must buy
customer_reviews.text: I buy Converse and it's always ends up my favorite I have to purchase a pair a couple times a year
customer_reviews.author: L Gorman

customer_reviews.title: Sent Wrong Product or Misleading Pictures
customer_reviews.text: Picture for the black and red shoes shows that it's made from a canvas material. The shoes I received were made from black faux leather.
customer_reviews.author: Ben D.

customer_reviews.title: Not leather
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality looks cheap in my opinion and it’s definitely not leather.
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: Fake converse bootlegs
customer_reviews.text: Not real converse On real Converse the O in converse has a star in it these do not which make these counterfeit bootlegs just looking out for everyone thinking about by in the shoes I am a sleeker head and know a lot about shoes stay away from these generic made and not real
customer_reviews.author: Ronnie I Moore Jr.

customer_reviews.title: why lie
customer_reviews.text: not what it say's really wanted leather but instead something else...why lie....
customer_reviews.author: LOVENT TAYLOR

customer_reviews.title: Converse Chuck
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE THE COLOR AND I LIKE THE WAY THEY FIT.
customer_reviews.author: RACHEL

product_meta.title: Converse Men's Unisex Chuck Taylor All Star Street Leather Mid Top Sneaker
product_meta.description: Just enough edge. Modern updates give the Converse Unisex Chuck Taylor All Star Street Mid Top Sneaker a little more attitude. The iconic mid-top design gets an added dose of texture with split-top leather and mesh, plus a padded collar and tongue. Inner elastic tongue for secure fit. The cushioned OrthoLite insole takes comfort to the next level. Unstoppable.
feature_bullets: Shaft measures approximately mid-top from arch
Durable, mid-top leather and mesh sneaker
Slip-on closure with heel loop for easy on and off
OrthoLite is a trademark of O2 Partners, LLC.
